<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:5ca249111bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcb1c<javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="WFH Record Producer">c76245111bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcb57</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
    g_form.hideFieldMsg('u_start_date');
    if (!g_form.getValue('u_end_date')) {
        g_form.setValue('u_end_date', g_form.getValue('u_start_date'));
    }
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
    g_form.showFieldMsg("u_start_date", "Start Date cannot be in past", 'error');
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Start Dates Checker</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-19 01:13:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fae8c9d51bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcbe5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Start Dates Checker</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_fae8c9d51bf45d106a08a9b4bd4bcbe5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-19 01:36:29</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
